description: Get creatively decadent with 5 simple ingredients! We use coconut and strawberries to top this sweet pizza, but you can use whatever you have at home for your own custom creation.
name: Easy Choc Hazelnut & Strawberry Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place rounds on tray, then bake for 20 minutes or until dough is golden and cooked through. Spread with choc hazelnut spread, then top with strawberries and coconut to serve.
